data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gil-Santana, Helcio R., Webb, Michael D. (2019): Transfer of the assassin bug Helonotus pallidulus Walker to the genus Heza Amyot & Serville (Hemiptera, Heteroptera, Reduviidae, Harpactorinae, Harpactorini). ZooKeys 872: 91-99, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.872.35137, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.872.35137
